        public void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                         Texture texture)
        Description copied from interface: Shader
        Sets the specified texture parameter. Automatically allocates a bind ID for the texture on OpenGL platforms. Note: Shader.begin() must be called before using this method
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
